scenario_text.value: Looks like we’ve made it to the finale.
It’s too early to lose focus, my boy.

Even if you say that... When I think back to
when we had no idea what’s going on...

You can tell we’re close to the end, can’t
you? Our goal is right in front of us.

Well yes, I suppose you’re right.
...We’ve certainly been through a lot.

I never imagined things would turn out
this way.

You’re telling me. My carefree school days
feel like something I made up.

...Oh, huh. That’s right...I’m a student,
ain’t I? Somehow I forgot that much.

I wonder if I can go right back to that
life... I’m honestly not sure.

You’re telling me. It must have been weird
when you went back that time, huh?

Yeah... But I think this time’s gonna be even
weirder than the last.

You’re...telling me. Brrr, I get chills just
thinking about it...

(Did I overdo it on the scare factor? Still,
I’m sure we can power through it together.)
(So then, what should I say to him?)
It won’t be so bad.
It’ll be pretty tough.
It won’t be so bad.
It won’t be so bad.

At this point, I feel like we can deal with
anything. Am I wrong?

You’re right! We’ve been working our butts
off over here, haven’t we?
We’ll just do the same in our world!

Indeed. Believing in yourself is the start of
everything.

You said it, man! Awright, let’s keep up the
good work!
It’ll be pretty tough.
It’ll be pretty tough.

I’m sure we’ll face things completely outside
our expectations. Just like in this world.

If it’s “just like this world,” then it’ll
all work out, I bet!
That’s how it’s gone for us here, after all.
Nothing wrong with such a positive outlook.
I knew you’d make the right call!
Let’s do our best, Takuma!
Yeah, I’m with you, man!

...Still, that conversation from before sure
threw me for a loop!
You mean the professor and Renamon?

Yeah. I can’t believe the professor came to
this world when he was a kid.

Renamon’s been protecting Miyuki ever since
the professor was a child, right?

You think you could do something like that
for such a long time?

I...want to say yes, but I imagine I couldn’t
stop her heart from breaking like that.

Yeah. After wanting to see someone important
to you for so long, it’s no surprise.

All the more reason we’ve gotta save this
world, AND ours.
I don’t want any regrets...

I hear that. Don’t think I could stomach
going back to our world with any regrets.
Guess that means I gotta do it to it!

(Minoru’s raring to go. I feel his resolve...
Heck, he could even lead us at this rate.)
(In that case, I’ll tell Minoru...)
Wanna be our leader?
Let’s all cooperate.
Wanna be our leader?
Wanna be our leader?

You kidding? I couldn’t get this group to do
a damn thing.

Yeah, I was just kidding. Still, you don’t
think you could do it?

Not a chance! I wouldn’t even want to try in
the first place.

People like you, or Aoi, or even Shuuji
should take the reins!

Well, you’re certainly not the type to stand
above others.
Right?

So that’s why I’m leaving all that jazz to
you, Takuma!
Let’s all cooperate.

Let’s all work together. None of us can do
much on our own...

But when we combine our strengths, we can do
just about anything.
Yeah! It’ll all work out for us!

You know, even if we save the two worlds, no
one’s gonna know about it, are they?

I doubt they will. If they did, things would
get pretty crazy, I figure.

Yeah, that’s true. Still, I wouldn’t mind
a little bit of the hero treatment...
I can’t really say the same...

I’m not saying I want people to fawn all over
me or nothing.

Just a little bit of praise would be nice.
Maybe a pass on the next test?
That sounds pretty nice.
Right? Man, just think about it...

(A reward for saving the world, huh? That’d
be great, but the idea feels problematic.)
(Hmm, what do I think?)
It’s best without it.
It sure would be nice.
It’s best without it.

It’s best without it. All that attention
would weird me out.

I just want a taste, that’s all. I don’t
wanna...end up on TV or something.

I don’t want anything like that. It’d suck if
we couldn’t talk like this anymore.

...True that. I’d hate it if I couldn’t hang
out with you or the others.

It’s enough if all of us here know what we
went through.

Yeah. Feels like that’d be more than enough!
Thanks, Takuma.
It sure would be nice.

It sure would be nice. We’ve been put through
our paces over here, after all.

Right? It’d be nice if people treated us like
the cool kids in our class, at least...

Ah man, if we keep gabbing we’ll lose prep
time. Gotta pack our bags for the fight.
Then I’ll go on ahead. Catch you later.

Hmm, I’d like some kinda reward, I guess...
Like a year’s worth of ramen! Whaddaya think?
